radiographic_examinations.findings: Increased activity at two areas with a maximum standardized uptake value (SUV) of 13.2 and 11.2, respectively.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The right upper and right lower lung mass gradually increased in size over 2 years.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple bilateral lung nodules and a right upper and right lower lung mass.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple bilateral lung nodules that remained relatively stable in size.
